meanings.definition: The state or quality of being abundant or lush in growth.
meanings.sent1: The garden displayed a luxuriance of colorful flowers and greenery.
meanings.sent2: The rainforest's luxuriance of plant life was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The luxuriance of weeds in the neglected yard was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back with a luxuriance that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The luxuriance of the harvest after a season of rain was a farmer's dream come true.

meanings.definition: An instance of this; an abundance or profusion.
meanings.sent1: The market was filled with a luxuriance of fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The luxuriance of gifts under the Christmas tree brought joy to the children.
meanings.sent3: The luxuriance of bubbles in the bath made the toddler giggle.
meanings.sent4: The luxuriance of stars in the night sky was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The luxuriance of books on the shelves delighted the avid reader.
